mapper.select: SELECT a.id, article_cover, article_title, SUBSTR(article_content, 1, 500) AS article_content, a.create_time, a.article_type, a.is_top, a.category_id, category_name, t.id AS tag_id, t.tag_name FROM ( SELECT id, article_cover, article_title, article_content, article_type, is_top, create_time, category_id FROM t_article WHERE is_delete = 0 AND `status` = 1 ORDER BY is_top DESC, id DESC LIMIT #{limit}, #{size} ) a INNER JOIN t_category c ON a.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN t_article_tag tat ON a.id = tat.article_id INNER JOIN t_tag t ON t.id = tat.tag_id ORDER BY a.is_top DESC, a.id DESC

SELECT a.id, article_cover, article_title, article_content, article_type, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.category_id, c.category_name, t.id AS tag_id, tag_name FROM t_article a INNER JOIN t_category c ON a.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN t_article_tag tat ON a.id = tat.article_id INNER JOIN t_tag t ON tat.tag_id = t.id WHERE is_delete = 0 AND `status` = 1 AND a.id = #{articleId}

SELECT id, article_title, article_content, is_delete, `status` FROM t_article
is_delete = 0 and `status` = 1
and (article_title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or article_content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
